titleStmt.title: The danger of treaties with popish-spirits, or, A seasonable caveat and premonition to our present most renowned Parliament touching the frail trust in the vowes and protestations of the popishly-affected princes for peace and reconcilement with their Protestant subjects.
titleStmt.author: Vicars, John, 1579 or 80-1652.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Vicars. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
